context.title: Changelog for Rule: ARIA attribute is valid
context.changelog: [{"commit":"e87fa0696963a2a7f950b35712cc93d9afb56dd7","msg":"fix: update links to WCAG21 resources (#776)","date":"1566375576"},{"commit":"71af6a0dfa82898888bcba743e9d1c700bdf92b8","msg":"Editorial changes (#725)","date":"1566371604"},{"commit":"0fb20354a0d25703eb95eb0603642ce7d7abe916","msg":"Fix citation of work in progress AAMs (#716)","date":"1564385038"},{"commit":"2ff7dd766c4ddaea9821ffe69bb886f933cc1838","msg":"chore: run prettier (#688)","date":"1563532966"},{"commit":"8dbf7d0d9b9aa933eaa3f5ad85999cad00a6c2c5","msg":"Map ARIA rules to ARIA instead of WCAG 4.1.2 (#607)","date":"1561988415"},{"commit":"67ebf8e238f57465d63426dd31673897d6cd12c1","msg":"fix: Make \"auto\" rules consistent with their SC (#587)","date":"1561388015"},{"commit":"1d7899bd85219c6661aa1600526663a8c922cb9b","msg":"Chore: Adapt site to ACT Rules CR format (#547)","date":"1557402394"},{"commit":"f0c84650f877f62fed6f9ab9d72adac343982980","msg":"Template update - ARIA attribute is valid (#495)","date":"1557243904"},{"commit":"a289b7510c398fc4366f3cf9d6bfc0bbb0c5529f","msg":"chore: rename files and update associations (#489)","date":"1556526852"},{"commit":"1ddc581088aa696b0875510158f2c57dd37c458a","msg":"chore: add unique id to all rules (#478)","date":"1555411093"},{"commit":"d38ab7e2d621f93aa213b0a151893bf3c9934ab8","msg":"chore: WCAG ACT RULES CG Website Update (#437)","date":"1555317646"},{"commit":"61c1c870c1866f6622868a81b295aa1f3137a714","msg":"fix: add assumptions to rules (#402)","date":"1551556991"},{"commit":"995b5213caece5a11e259a118aa4819d15c74ac8","msg":"Rule: SC4-1-2-aria-attr-valid (#231)","date":"1540902877"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"5f99a7","name":"ARIA attribute is valid","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that each `aria-` attribute specified is defined in ARIA 1.1.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree"],"authors":["Jey Nandakumar"]}
